text: Yesli vy (neveruyushchiye) prosili vynesti prigovor, to prigovor uzhe yavilsya k vam. Yesli vy prekratite, to tak budet luchshe dlya vas. No yesli vy vozobnovite, to i My vozobnovim (yesli vy vnov' stanete srazhat'sya protiv veruyushchikh, to My vnov' nanesem vam porazheniye), i vash otryad ne prineset vam nikakoy pol'zy, dazhe yesli budet mnogochislennym. Voistinu, Allakh - s veruyushchimi
